sentence: In 2022, the overall offline training was less affected by the epidemic, the number of offline training organised has increased and the number of course participants has increased, which was the main reason for the increase in the number of days of the overall trainees compared with that in 2021. 7.

In 2022, the overall offline training was less affected by the epidemic, the number of offline training organised has increased and the number of course participants has increased, which was the main reason for the increase in the number of days of the overall trainees compared with that in 2021. 6.
